block.p: Manhattan

GREENWICH VILLAGE $1.6 million 20 East Ninth Street (Brevoort East) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 1,850-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; entry foyer, two kitchens; gym in building; maintenance $2,216, 50% tax deductible; listed at $1.75 million, 43 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

UPPER EAST SIDE $860,000 188 East 64th Street (Royale) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 740-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; Central Park view, 3 exposures; terrace; gym and laundry facilities in building; common charge $633; taxes $7,560; listed at $920,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Peter Ashe Real Estate)

MORNINGSIDE HEIGHTS $399,000 993 Amsterdam Avenue (109th Street) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; maintenance $349, no tax deduction; listed at $399,000, 2 weeks on market (brokers: Corcoran Group; Manhattan Apartments)

HAMILTON HEIGHTS $760,000 559 West 159th Street 3-family, 4-story prewar attached brick house; 2 bedrooms, eat-in kitchen in primary unit; 1 bedroom in upper-floor units; 1 bath in each; 15-by-99-ft. lot; taxes $1,476; listed at $775,000, 15 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

HUDSON HEIGHTS $555,000 730 Fort Washington Avenue (Margaret Corbin Circle) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,050-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar Art Deco building; part-time doormen; sunken living room, marble bath; common gardens and exercise room in building; maintenance $940, 34% tax deductible; listed at $585,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Simone Song Properties)
Bronx
RIVERDALE

$600,000 3816 Waldo Avenue (Waterford) 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,238-sq.-ft. condo in a 2-year-old building; part-time doormen; dining area, laundry, south exposure; terrace; recreation room in building; common charge $564; taxes $154 (abated); listed at $615,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property)
Brooklyn

BROOKLYN HEIGHTS $413,000 215 Adams Street (Concord Village) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 769-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; dining area, renovated kitchen and marble bath, hardwood floors, north and west exposures, Manhattan skyline view; common roof deck and laundry in building; maintenance $841, 39% tax deductible; listed at $429,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Bellmarc Realty)

FORT GREENE $2.18 million 348 Carlton Avenue 2-family, 4-story prewar town house; 3 bedrooms, 3 baths, dining room, double parlor, library with fireplace, French doors, private deck in primary unit; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, rear patio in other unit; dining room, original molding and detail in each; 22-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,384; listed at $2.25 million, 19 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)
Queens

BAYSIDE $440,000 33-27 204th Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, wood colonial; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen with new countertops, family room, finished basement, hardwood floors, 3-zone heat; 18-by-95-ft. lot; taxes $1,316; listed at $459,888, 4 weeks on market (broker: ReMax Millennium)

HOLLIS $585,000 190-18 89th Avenue 7-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 92-year-old vinyl-sided colonial; dining room, eat-in kitchen, living room, family room, hardwood floors; 1-car garage; 55-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $3,226; listed at $649,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Goller & Costi)
Indiana
INDIANAPOLIS

$142,000 1744 Crossman Drive 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 42-year-old 1-story brick- and vinyl-sided house; dining room, updated kitchen, family room, sunroom, new windows and roof; 2-car garage; 120-by-150-ft. lot; taxes $1,734; listed at $146,900, 14 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Ron Matthews Realtors)
INDIANAPOLIS

$296,000 6616 Tuxedo Lane 4-bedroom, 6-bath, 20-year-old 2-story brick- and wood-sided house; wraparound porch, renovated eat-in kitchen with breakfast room, bonus room above garage, 2 fireplaces; rear deck, in-ground pool; 100-by-114-ft. lot; taxes $2,404; listed at $309,900, 13 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 at the Crossing)

INDIANAPOLIS $705,000 8656 Bay Colony Drive 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 10-year-old 1-story brick-sided house; entry foyer, dining room, eat-in kitchen with walk-in pantry, family room with fireplace, cathedral ceilings, wine cellar; in-ground pool, 3-car garage; 0.65-acre lot; taxes $9,340; listed at $769,500, 19 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 at the Crossing)

AVON $166,350 992 Weeping Way 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 8-year-old 2-story brick- and vinyl-sided house; eat-in kitchen; gas fireplace, home office; 2-car garage; 70-by-135-ft. lot; taxes $1,770; listed at $169,450, 17 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Ron Matthews Realtors)
AVON

$315,000 6279 Red Alder Drive 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 14-year-old 2-story brick-sided house; foyer, oak staircase, den, sunroom; in-ground pool, 3-car garage; 121-by-217-ft. lot; taxes $4,190; listed at $324,500, 16 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Ron Matthews Realtors)
